name: Next.js Invoke Supabase Edge Function
description: Call a Supabase Edge Function from a Route Handler.

files.template:
import { createClient } from '@supabase/supabase-js';
export async function GET(){ const supa = createClient(process.env.NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_URL!, process.env.NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_ANON_KEY!); const { data, error } = await supa.functions.invoke('{{fn}}', { body: { msg:'hi' } }); return Response.json({ data, error }); }
